Join Us Saturday, September 16, For A Holiday!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2000 Topics (Year Of The Phoenix): Join Us Saturday, September 16, For A Holiday!
By Lisa Shock on Friday, September 8, 2000 - 10:49 am:

Saturday September 16 is the third Saturday in September this year, and I thought we should have a celebration to honor the Metalners!

We'll be looking for storytellers in Chat and in print to honor the legends of the aliens. Drop by Chat anytime on the 16th to help celebrate!

There's also a fiction writing contest!

Fiction Contest Guidelines


All fiction must be posted on Monster Rancher Metropolis before 11:59 PM PDT September 30, 2000.
(This allows everyone inspired on that day to get an entry in!) Submissions may be in any form, epic, short story, poetry. Judging will be conducted by Lisa Shock, all decisions are final.

Anyone may enter, including Moderators, as long as they are 13 years of age or older. (If under 13 I MUST have a signed parental release form, submitted via US Mail.

Prizes include an ASCII Grip one-hand controller for PSX, Monster Rancher first edition booster packs of CCG cards, and Metal Gear metal notebooks.

Entries must be in good taste. Like any other posts they must follow the guidelines posted in the Welcome Message, in the Office of the Mayor section.
